info: Comprehensively reporting life cycle assessment results.
name: EPD

info: Certifying sustainable managed forests and traceability of wood and other forests derived products.
name: FSC

info: Endorsement and recognition of national forest certification systems.
name: PEFC

info: Affirms the good's conformity with European health, safety, and environmental protection standards.
name: CE

info: To demonstrate that products, services, or processes comply with relevant EU legislation.
name: HEN

info: Alternative for construction products not covered by hEN.
name: ETA

info: Certify strict environmental requirements in all relevant phases of a product's life cycle.
name: Nordic Swan

info: For products that respects the three pillars of sustainability: social, economic, and environmental.
name: Rainforest Alliance Certified

info: The European Commission has proposed the Product Environmental Footprint and Organisation Environmental Footprint methods as a common way of measuring environmental performance.
name: EMAS

info: Environmental excellence of product and services.
name: EU Ecolabel

info: The German federal government ecolabel certifies environmentally sound products and services.
name: BLUE angle

info:
Products with textiles tested for harmful substances
Rainforest Alliance Certified - for products that respects the three pillars of sustainability: social, economic, and environmental.
name: OEKOTEX

info: International standard for environmental management system (EMS) of organisations.
name: ISO14001

info: Premium EMS instrument from the European Commission.
name: EMAS

id: Carbon Trust Product / Organisation Footprint Certification
info: Quantified and certified carbon footprint of products or organisations.
name: Natureplus

info: The governmental ecolabel based on transparent criteria and sound third-party verification.
name: Österreichische Umweltzeichen (UZ 07 und UZ 28)
